text:
@EricTrump @realDonaldTrump Let's look at your dad's coronavirus #'s in the last 24 hrs:
3.4 mil cases worldwide, 1.1 mil (32%) in US
94.5k new cases worldwide, 36k (38%) in US
5.6k new deaths, 1.9k (34%) in US

He's an epic FAILURE.
